Viktor Blåsjö

Viktor Blåsjö

Utrecht University

Historian of mathematics. Advocate of the mathematician's point of view throughout history and philosophy of science and historiography. Incorri

The alleged threat of contradictions or paradoxes in the pre-rigorous period is often vastly exaggerated by writers in the post-rigorous period. This is natural, since it is a form of self-rationalisation or self-congratulation for those who have worked hard to learn the rigor.
